```{python libraries}
import pandas as pd
import yfinance
from stock_indicators import indicators
from stock_indicators import Quote
from lightweight_charts import Chart
import asyncio
import nest_asyncio
nest_asyncio.apply()
```

```{python}
df = yfinance.download("AAPL", start="2023-01-01", end="2024-01-01", multi_level_index=False)
# Reset the index to make the 'Date' column available
df.reset_index(inplace=True)
# Rename columns to match the expected format
df.rename(columns={
    'Date': 'date',
    'Open': 'open',
    'High': 'high',
    'Low': 'low',
    'Close': 'close',
    'Volume': 'volume'
}, inplace=True)

quotes = [
    Quote(d, o, h, l, c, v)
    for d, o, h, l, c, v in zip(
        df['date'], df['open'], df['high'], df['low'], df['close'], df['volume']
    )
]

df['rsi'] = [r.rsi for r in indicators.get_rsi(quotes, 14)]
df.tail()
```

```{python}
if __name__ == '__main__':
    chart = Chart(inner_width=1, inner_height=0.8)
    chart.time_scale(visible=False)

    chart2 = chart.create_subchart(width=1, height=0.2, sync=True)
    line = chart2.create_line()
    df2 = df[['date', 'rsi']].dropna().rename(columns={'rsi': 'value'})
    
    
    chart.set(df)
    line.set(df2)

    chart.show(block=True)
```
